headline: Buy Wide-Moat PepsiCo: Activist Involvement Is Icing On The Cake
summary: PepsiCo has underperformed the S&P 500 and key peers over 5- and 10-year periods, with notably lower total returns. Read why I rate PEP stock a Buy now.
